alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 29 at 2:41PM MST until December 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, except 8 to 15 inches over the mountains possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Upper Treasure Valley zone. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...For the Winter Weather Advisory, travel could be difficult. For the Winter Storm Watch, travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some uncertainty exists about when the snow will turn to rain. Rain may begin as early as Saturday morning, but may be as late as Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
